definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, violet/Colors of the rainbow
pinyin: hong2 cheng2 huang2 lu:4 lan2 dian4 zi3

definition: (bird species of China) blue-crowned laughingthrush (Garrulax courtoisi)

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop an HPLC method for the determination of indirubin in rat plasma.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立大鼠血浆中靛玉红浓度的测定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the relative content of Indirubin and Indigo of Indigowoad root from different areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较不同来源板蓝根中靛玉红与靛蓝的相对含量。

sentences.english: Study on determination of crude ammonia in meat by Indophenol-blue colorimetry;
sentences.chinese: 研究了靛酚蓝光度法在虾肉测定蛋白质中的应用。

sentences.english: To study the extracting technology condition of indirubin in Indigo Naturalis.
sentences.chinese: 青黛中靛玉红提取工艺的研究。

sentences.english: The content of indirubin and cholic acid was determined by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 采用高效液相色谱法测定制剂中靛玉红和胆酸的含量。

sentences.english: Methods Arginine and indirubin in this preparation were identified by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用薄层色谱法鉴别该制剂中精氨酸和靛玉红。

sentences.english: Beautiful indigo, violet colors spinning nice and open and clockwise.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的靛青色和紫罗兰色顺时针均匀地旋转打开。

definition: capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)
to wash/to rinse/any of three 10-day division of the month (during Tang dynasty)/Taiwan pr. [huan3]/also pr. [wan3]
lilac daphne (Daphne genkwa), used in Chinese herbal medicine
brown/gray or dark color/coarse hemp cloth/Taiwan pr. [he2]
